song.title: Sweet Dreams Remix
song.info:
Sweet Dreams Remix remixed by: eXOdus
Originally Tracked by: ELWOOD
Finished 5/31/13 Samples (see sample text): Anvil Elwood Me Sample Packs ChoriumRevA.sf2 (samples ripped from soundfont using Soundfont Exporter)
If you like this song, then please favorite it! This is my first song under my new name eXOdus. Thanks for listening!
This song is dedicated to all my friends, my family, my loves, and to everyone who listened to this song. But most of all, this song is dedicated to Elwood and Anvil, the two Tracking Kings. I wish they still tracked. This remix isn't as good as the original, but I hope that if you like the original, that you will like the remix. I was hoping to finish this song on my birth- day (May 6, 14 yrs.), but school prevented this. I'll be a 9th grader this fall! And with physical growth comes experience!
This is the first song on my album Elwood Rebirthed. I will have more Elwood remixes coming soon! Coming Soon (maybe): Dead Lock Remix Into the Shadow Remix Sick on Monday Remix
My trax (coming soon): The Lost Cause Genre: Undecided (Possibly Synthpop, Techno, or Dubstep) Progress: about 3%
Fire of Love Genre: Trance/House Progress: about 5%
?Mystery Song? Genre: TBA Progress: 0% (Mystery Song indicates that I may just start working on a random song on a random day)
Please support me by continuing to listen to my music!
Questions/Comments: E-Mails: exodusmodules_gmail. com nelsonjaddison_gmail. com My Websites: 3xodus.newgrounds.com modarchive.org (search for me!) I'm making a blog and my own website, too.
Have a nice Summer! Until next time...
